name: PYTHON Adapter
content:
# Python Adapter

**Style & typing**: PEP 8, PEP 257 docstrings, type hints; mypy (strict on touched modules); prefer dataclasses.
**Testing**: pytest with fixtures/parametrize; tmp_path/monkeypatch; avoid real network/disk I/O.
**Lint/Format/Type**: ruff, black, mypy.
**Runbook**
```
ruff check .
black .
mypy .
pytest -q
```
